import React from "react"; import { useState } from "react"; import GamingData from "./GamingData"; import { FaSearch, FaBahai, FaHome, FaRegEye, FaUserPlus, FaWpexplorer, FaSave, FaPlayCircle, FaRegThumbsUp, FaComment, FaShare, FaGlobeAmericas, FaEllipsisH, } from "react-icons/fa"; function Gaming(props) { const [like, setLike] = useState(false); const [share, setshare] = useState(false); return ( <>

{GamingData.map((Gaming) => { return (
{Gaming.userName} {Gaming.liveStatus}

{Gaming.PostedTime}

{Gaming.postText}

{ //Check if Video url is empty then show image if it is available. (Gaming.postedVideo === '') ? : //else show video
setLike(!like)} className={like ? "toggled_like_comment_share" : "d-block"}>

Comment
setshare(!share)} className={share ? "toggled_like_comment_share" : "d-block"}>
Share
); })}
) } export default Gaming;
